result.execSummary:
The defendant Mohamud Mohamed Hassan was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: as a Party to a Crime, Penalties for Misdemeanors-Class "A"], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Court reads-in and dismisses 16CF49.
Defendant to report to Probation today December 13, 2016 by 3:00 p.m.
Court notes 10 days credit if revoked.

 
In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

miscConds.notes:
$2700.00 restitution (16CF49) to be collected by DOC as a condition of probation in Count 1 Case #16CM105.
$1167.00 restitution to be collected by DOC as a condition of probation in Count 1 Case #16CM105.
Court costs of $443.00 are suspended due to no ability to pay.

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Mohamud Mohamed Hassan

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: signed by Def & Atty this date. eif

Apprs: CO: HWC for SRN, Rpr: TAPE, Clerk: Rohan. ADA:  Alexis S. Mckinley   DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea   DF:  Mohamud Mohamed Hassan appeared. Includes 16CF49, 16CM105. Case called at 11:40 am. Atty. Andrea recites agreement. ADA McKinley confirms and requests Court accept joint recommendation. DE pleads NC to Ct 1 in 16CM105. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Atty. Andrea makes statement regarding restitution, DEF is to make a good faith effort to pay. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 1 in 16CM105. On motion of the State without objection, Crt dismisses Ct 1 in 16CF49, which will be read in for purposes of restitution ($2,700). DEF makes statement to Court.
Crt orders:
16CM105 - Sent W/H, 1 year probation - to report by 3:00 pm 12/13/16
-Court costs $443 (all suspended by Court due to no ability by DEF to pay)
-Restitution $1,167
-20 hours community service
-Court Orders 10 days credit for time served in event of revocation
-16CF49 read in for $2,700 restitution
Court explains right to appeal

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson. ADA: Alexis S. Mckinley DF ATTY: Alex Andrea DF: Mohamud Mohamed Hassan appeared. Case called at 11:56. Scheduled for a FPT. Includes 16CM105, 16CF49. Atty Andrea updates the court. ADA McKinley responds. Cut off for negotiations will be 12-13-2016. Address confirmed. Bond Continues.  Jury trial scheduled for January 4, 2017 at 08:00 am.  Final pre-trial scheduled for December 13, 2016 at 11:30 am.

Apprs: CO: SRN, Rpr: Kasten, Clerk: Evenson.ADA:  Alexis S. McKinley   DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea   DF:  Mohamud Mohamed Hassan appeared. Case called at 11:12. Includes 16CM105 (PTC), 16CF110(PH).  Atty. Andrea updates the court.

pre-signed waiver of extradition signed by Defendant this date. eif

INCLUDES 16CF49 and 16CM105

Defendant to sign a Pre-Waiver of Extradition.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, AT & T Store Hudson WI, Sprint Store in Hudson WI, Abdiid A., or Olad O.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

CO: SRN, RPR: Vicki Kasten, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA: Megan E. Kelly,  DF ATTY:  Alex Andrea,  DF:  Mohamud Mohamed Hassan appeared from jail via video.   Includes 16CF49 and 16CM105. Court confirms address.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG on 16CM105.  Waives speedy trial. QUASH WARRANT.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 22, 2016 at 11:00 am.
